title: Where did my skin go?
body: I havent been logged in for a year and now when I logged in my one and only skin that a friend gave to me along time ago, is gone. Why? How do I get it back?

replies.body: We'd like to help out individually with your issue to find out what's going on.  Reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look more closely into your missing item.  We'll reply back asap!
